name: .MCA
summary: Learn about .MCA files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: To use an MCA file as a Minecraft region, place the file in an appropriate region sub-directory. Most likely, you will want to place a group of related MCA files in a region sub-directory at the same time, to use them as a world's Overworld, Nether, or End. Note that MCA files created for newer versions of Minecraft may not work in older versions of Minecraft, and vice-versa.
You can also open an MCA file in NBTExplorer (multiplatform), to view the region data it contains.
